Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: pm2

Arguments.Name: -m
Arguments.Description: Displays a compacted list without formatting

Arguments.Name: -l
Arguments.Description: Specifies entire log file (error and out are both included)

Arguments.Name: -k
Arguments.Description: Delays before sending final SIGKILL signal to process

Arguments.Name: --max-memory-restart
Arguments.Description: Specify max memory amount used to autorestart (in octet or use syntax like 100M)

Arguments.Name: --restart-delay
Arguments.Description: Specify a delay between restarts (in milliseconds)

Arguments.Name: --env
Arguments.Description: Specify environment to get specific env variables

Arguments.Name: --log-type
Arguments.Description: Specify log output style (raw by default, json optional)

Arguments.Name: -x
Arguments.Description: Execute a program using fork system

Arguments.Name: --max-restarts
Arguments.Description: Only Restart the script COUNT times

Arguments.Name: -u
Arguments.Description: Defines user when generating startup script

Arguments.Name: --hp
Arguments.Description: Defines home path when generating startup script

Arguments.Name: --wait-ip
Arguments.Description: Overrides systemd script to wait for full internet connectivity to launch pm2

Arguments.Name: --service-name
Arguments.Description: Defines service name when generating startup script

Arguments.Name: -c
Arguments.Description: Restarts a running process based on a cron pattern

Arguments.Name: --interpreter
Arguments.Description: The interpreter pm2 should use for executing app (bash, python…)

Arguments.Name: --log-date-format
Arguments.Description: Adds custom prefix timestamp to logs

Arguments.Name: --no-daemon
Arguments.Description: Runs pm2 daemon in the foreground if it doesn’t exist already

Arguments.Name: –-only
Arguments.Description: With json declaration, allow to only act on one application

Arguments.Name: –-wait-ready
Arguments.Description: Asks pm2 to wait for ready event from your app

Arguments.Name: –-merge-logs
Arguments.Description: Merges logs from different instances but keep error and out separated

Arguments.Name: –-node-args
Arguments.Description: Space delimited arguments to pass to node in cluster mode

Arguments.Name: –-no-vizion
Arguments.Description: Starts an app without vizion feature (versioning control)

Arguments.Name: –-no-autorestart
Arguments.Description: Starts an app without automatic restart

Arguments.Name: –-no-treekill
Arguments.Description: Only kills the main process, not detached children

Arguments.Name: –-sort
Arguments.Description: Sort process according to field’s name
